ygData.subject: Message Board
ygData.msgSnippet: I put up a message board for Members at the login site, as well as a logout feature. All members can post new topics, reply to topics, and log out at will. I

I put up a message board for Members at the login site, as well as a
logout feature. All members can post new topics, reply to topics, and
log out at will. I really hope people use it. Things like TF
conversations would be great for it.

PS. If anyone has a better idea for the colors, tell me!
